title: Connection Management (Admin)
description: Admin-level specifications for connection lifecycle management across all services

specs.title: List all connections for current workspace
specs.given: user is authenticated in a workspace
specs.then: system displays list of all configured connections with status

specs.title: Connect a connection via OAuth flow
specs.given: connection exists with valid OAuth credentials but is not connected
specs.then: OAuth flow completes successfully and connection status becomes 'connected'

specs.title: Disconnect an active connection
specs.given: connection is in 'connected' status with active tokens
specs.then: connection status changes to 'disconnected' and OAuth tokens are revoked

specs.title: Copy shareable connection link
specs.given: connection is configured and shareable feature is enabled
specs.then: shareable connection URL is copied to clipboard
